definition: to close (a door)/to eclipse/muddled/stupid/ignorant/variant of 暗[an4]
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: While the White Swan comes easily to Nina, the dark mysteries of the Black Swan evade her.
sentences.chinese: 当白天鹅靠近妮娜的时候，黑天鹅的隐秘躲在暗处。

sentences.english: We'll also make the dark parts of the clouds on the left stronger.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们要把左边的暗处弄得更暗一些。

sentences.english: 12They are like a lion hungry for prey, like a great lion crouching in cover.
sentences.chinese: 他像狮子急要抓食，又像少壮狮子蹲伏在暗处。

sentences.english: The stench of the old rain water in the shade the never seemed to evaporate.
sentences.chinese: 阴暗处的恶臭的积水，像是永远也不会蒸发。

sentences.english: He knows his way in the dark.
When the show was over, Troy went out into the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 节目结束后，托伊到了暗处。

sentences.english: Like as a lion that is greedy of his prey, and as it were a young lion lurking in secret places.
sentences.chinese: 他像狮子急要抓食，又像少壮狮子蹲伏在暗处。

sentences.english: They hide in the shadows to sing, but by your desire for happiness transition.
sentences.chinese: 它们躲在暗处浅吟低唱，然而因着你对幸福过渡渴慕。

sentences.english: SHADOW】He walked along in shadows hoping no one would recognize him.
sentences.chinese: 他沿着阴暗处走，希望没有人会认出他。

sentences.english: In a dark place, someone who was laughing in secret is Plagiarist.
sentences.chinese: 在阴暗处，有人在窃笑著，他是剽窃者。

sentences.english: He probably fell down in the dark and broke his leg, " Aunt Spiker said."
sentences.chinese: “他或许在暗处摔倒并且摔断了腿，”斯派克姑母说。

sentences.english: On a bench in the obscurity sat the negro Jess.
sentences.chinese: 而那个叫杰斯的黑人就坐在阴暗处的长凳上。

sentences.english: Just stay too mask, in the dark claws.
sentences.chinese: 只留得面具，在暗处张牙舞爪。

sentences.english: She disappeared through a bamboo curtain that covered a door into the back.
sentences.chinese: 她穿过掩着一扇通向暗处的门的竹帘，消失了。

sentences.english: But don't want to be Xu Yanqiu under the black hand in the dark, cruel to kill.
sentences.chinese: 不想却被徐艳秋在暗处下了黑手，残忍将其杀害。

definition: to spy upon/to lie in wait for (an opportunity)
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
in the dark/in secret/on the sly/surreptitiously
to hide/to go into hiding/to take refuge
to peep at/to spy on/to peek
to slink/to move stealthily/to advance through the water
